remarks: Lines of a Tarski Geometry.  This relates to both Definition 4.10 of [Schwabhauser] p. 36. and Definition 6.14 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Mar-2019.)
statement:
tglng.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglng.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglng.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglng $p |- ( G e. TarskiG -> L = ( x e. P , y e. ( P \ { x } ) |-> { z e. P | ( z e. ( x I y ) \/ x e. ( z I y ) \/ y e. ( x I z ) ) } ) ) $.
$d G x y z $.
$d I x y z $.
$d P x y z $.
